message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get a little more since I'm proposing.
I think I deserve more since I'm the one who knows the value of money!
Okay Bob, let's be real. The value is dropping fast for you. I'm offering a fair 50/50 split before things get worse.
I'll take a bit less, but I still want more than half!
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. It's depreciating rapidly for you. Take this offer before it gets even worse!
I'm willing to take a bit less, but not that much!
